hops.message: Queries ConversationParticipant table to verify user authorization
Queries Conversation table using session.get() to retrieve conversation data
Returns ConversationRead model with conversation data
WebSocket context uses mock data, no direct API calls to this endpoint found
Message interface consumes conversation data but via WebSocket context, not direct API calls
Basic router test confirms /v1/messaging/conversations endpoint is active

defects.msg: Frontend uses mock data instead of actual API integration - no HTTP calls to REST endpoint found
Function name `get_conversation` doesn't follow naming convention expected by symbol `websocket_get_conversation_GET`
No specific unit tests for get_conversation REST endpoint, only WebSocket tests exist
ConversationRead.model_validate() could potentially fail without proper error handling
ConversationParticipant model has role field missing from model definition but used in other endpoints
